description: I have been working with HTML since I learned XHTML in 2010. I am very proficient in HTML5 and have lots of experience creating websites from scratch.

I have been working with CSS since I began writing HTML in 2010. I am proficient in all current and upcoming CSS features and have built pages using the new flexbox layout that are currently in produciton as of Nov 2016.
I am an expert at JavaScript and have a deep understanding of the core functinalities of the language such as closures, callbacks and prototypal inheritence.

I deployed my first angular app in January 2015 and have continued to gain expertice in the framework since then. I have recently gained a firm understanding of Angular2 by completeing various courses on udemy.com and working with NativeScript.
I use bootstrap on a daily basis to build HTML pages. I am well versed in all aspects of the framework and also have experience buiding custom bootstrap themes.

I have built various REST API's with node.js in order to provided a backend for Angular applications. I have also built a proxy server with Node that manages a salesforce instance. Node.js is also my prefered langauage for any scripting tasks.

I use SASS in order to keep CSS clean and modular. In 2016 I migrated a large enterpirse level anguar app from one large CSS file to multiple organized SASS folders & files; drastically increasing maintainability and modularity.
Although I have used many postcss plugins to achieve various different goals. I mainly use postcss to autoprefix CSS and to take advantage of some future CSS features.
I use nativescript with Angular2 in order to build mutlti platoform native applications. I have only built one application so far but am very comfortable and confident using the framework.
I have designed countless web pages and application features in AI. I am also proficient at making icons and SVG art.
I user axure for wireframing ideas and creating click through prototypes that can be presented to customers in order to aid in requirments gathering.
I use polymer to take advantage of the upcoming web components feature. This resume site is built using web components in order to drastically increase modularity and maintainability.
Grunt is my common choice for build tasks on complex angular applications. I use grunt for various tasks such as spinning up local servers and depolying code to production.
Git is my preffered version control software. I use version control for all of my ongoing projects and push some of them to my github page.

Currently I have used elastic beanstalk to deploy an Angular 2 app and S3 to host a static website (this site is hosted on amazon s3). I also have professional training on the basics of the platform and plan to increase my knowledge over the next year.
Before I learned Angular JQuery was used in almost all my projects. I am still proficient in JQuery and often use it when creating angular directives.
I have built various sites that utilize PHP server side scripting to query databases and run C.R.U.D. operations.

Although ajax functinality is abstracted away from the developer when using powerful frameworks like Angular, I stil understand the core funtinality of Ajax and can write a vanilla Ajax script that sends HTTP requests.
I used the C programming language to code a simple bash shell for UNIX operating systems. The shell ran basic commands such as 'ls' and 'mv'. A linked list was used for job control.
I have experience building Java GUI applications that implement Object Oriented design concepts.
I have built and used MYSQL databases. SQL commands were executed on the database using PHP scripts.
